SystemParameter.Name: Service.AutoGroup.Switch
SystemParameter.Comment: Autogroup toggle (system-controlled) to turn on/off the autogrouping process.

SystemParameter.Name: Service.AutoGroup.User.Switch
SystemParameter.Comment: Autogroup toggle available for the user to turn on/off the autogrouping process.

SystemParameter.Name: cronReturnsEventProcessor
SystemParameter.Comment: CRON style schedule string for Return Event Processing
